description: Learn the basic fundamental rules in photography and how to apply them in your everyday life. The course consists of 18 short video lessons with 55 min. of information. In the course I am going to explain the fundamental rules and guidelines in photography such as exposure, composition and light qualities. My goal as a teacher is to show you how easy it is to create stunning images no matter of the camera that you are using. You can take on the lessons at your own pace. There is no time limit so enjoy the learning at a pace that suits your daily routine. If you have any questions I am going to answer them sa soon as they are asced.
title: How to take amazing photographs with your mobile device
